content.stem:
Describe the persuasive technique the narrator uses to support the idea that space exploration benefits humans. Use details from the presentation to support your answer.

 

Type your answer in the space provided.

rubric.name: Rubric 2
rubric.val:
A two-point response includes a description of the persuasive technique the narrator uses and a correct supporting detail from the presentation.

Approach:

  • emotional approach / shocks the reader / appeals to emotions/ takes an active role by holding all people accountable

 

Details:

  • shortsighted / ignorant / poorer

  • almost certain to improve our lives

  • untold riches

sample.name: 2-Point Other Official Sample Answers
sample.samplecontent:
The narrator believes that space exploration can benefit humans in many different ways. The narrator appeals to listeners’ emotions with statements such as “Never looking beyond our own backyard will leave us shortsighted, ignorant, and ultimately poorer for our lack of courage and vision.” This extreme description attempts to shock the reader into agreement.

 

Furthermore, the narrator is persistent and emphasizes that people need to take an active role in supporting future space exploration by urging that “there is work for all of us to do.” The narrator goes on to say that we must “put our money where our hearts and minds are and demand the budgets and write the checks for space exploration.”

rubric.name: Rubric 1
rubric.val: A one-point response includes a description of the persuasive technique the narrator uses without supporting details from the text.

sample.name: 1-Point Official Sample Answer
sample.samplecontent: The narrator tries to convince listeners by shocking them with extreme statements, and by emphasizing the need for everyone to take an active role in space exploration.

rubric.name: Rubric 0
rubric.val: A response that does not describe the persuasive technique the narrator uses to support the idea that space exploration benefits humans. No credit is awarded for providing details from the presentation without a description of the narrator’s persuasive technique.

sample.name: 0-Point Official Sample Answer
sample.samplecontent: The narrator is talking about how space exploration is good for humans.
